ai-dn23:34.4_0: But the brahmin student Uttara who organized the offering gave gifts carefully, thoughtfully, with his own hands, not giving the dregs. When his body broke up, after death, he was reborn in company with the gods of the Thirty-Three.”
ai-dn23:34.5_0: The tenth section on Pāyāsi is finished.
